question.en: Together, take the funniest picture using the silliest camera filter you can find.
question.sl: Skupaj posnemita najbolj zabavno sliko z najbolj norim filtrom, ki ga najdeta.

question.en: Record a 10-second video together while making funny faces.
question.sl: Posnemita 10-sekundni video, medtem ko delata smešne grimase.

question.en: Search online together for a joke and read it out loud.
question.sl: Skupaj poiščita šalo na internetu in jo glasno preberita.

question.en: Find a song you both like and play it while dancing together for 20 seconds.
question.sl: Poiščita pesem, ki vama je všeč, in zaplešita 20 sekund.

question.en: Use the phone to draw or doodle something silly together.
question.sl: Na telefonu skupaj narišita nekaj zabavnega.

question.en: Take a photo of both of you making the biggest smile you can.
question.sl: Posnemita fotografijo, na kateri imata največji nasmeh.

question.en: Search online together for a picture of your favorite animal.
question.sl: Skupaj poiščita sliko vajine najljubše živali na internetu.

question.en: Together, find a recipe online for a dessert you would both like to try.
question.sl: Skupaj na internetu poiščita recept za sladico, ki bi jo rada poskusila.

question.en: Take a selfie together and send it to a family member.
question.sl: Posnemita selfie in ga pošljita družinskemu članu.

question.en: Use the voice recorder on the phone to record both of you saying something silly.
question.sl: Uporabita snemalnik glasu in posnemita, kako skupaj rečeta nekaj zabavnega.
